parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS system can cause the brake pedal to travel abnormally to the floor, leading to a loss of braking power, which can increase the risk of accidents and injuries.
symptoms: the brake pedal travels to the floor
the vehicle stops and then jumps ahead
the vehicle is unable to stop

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake pedal can cause the pedal to travel abnormally to the floor, leading to a loss of braking power, which can increase the risk of accidents and injuries.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the brake pedal travels to the floor
the vehicle is unable to stop.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake rotor can cause the wheel to lock up, leading to a loss of control and increasing the risk of accidents and injuries.
symptoms: causing the front wheel to lock up.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The lack of a safety relief valve in the cooling system can lead to the fill bottle exploding when overheating occurs, causing damage to the vehicle and potentially injuring the driver or passengers.

The failure of the serpentine belt can cause the loss of essential systems such as the alternator, power steering, and air conditioning, leading to a loss of vehicle control and potentially causing accidents.
symptoms: Squealing or screeching noise from the engine

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the radiator hose clamp can cause coolant leaks, leading to engine overheating and potentially causing damage to the engine and surrounding components.

The failure of the vibration pulley mounting can cause the serpentine belt to shred, leading to the loss of essential systems such as the alternator, power steering, and air conditioning, and potentially causing accidents.
symptoms: Squealing or screeching noise from the engine

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering system can cause the vehicle to become difficult to steer, increasing the risk of accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The power steering is stiff or difficult to turn
the power steering is cold or unresponsive
the power steering pump is noisy or whining
the vehicle is difficult to steer.
